H0.text: What Caribbean nation is considered the first black-led republic in the world. Jamaica

H1.text: What Caribbean nation is considered the first black-led republic in the world. Barbados

H2.text: What Caribbean nation is considered the first black-led republic in the world. Dominican Republic

H3.text: What Caribbean nation is considered the first black-led republic in the world. Haïti

A4.text: The 1791–1804 Haitian Revolution made Haiti the first sovereign state in the Caribbean, the second republic in the Americas, the first country in the Americas to officially abolish slavery, and the only country in history established by a slave revolt.
